WorkItem.Description:
Implement code for Reed Solomon encode and test.

This is for QRCode's Error correction.

 

Some resource:

http://www.pclviewer.com/rs2/calculator.html

http://www.ee.unb.ca/cgi-bin/tervo/calc2.pl?num=1+0+7+6&den=1+6+3&f=m&p=4&d=1&y=1

http://sidewords.wordpress.com/2007/10/08/algebraic-soft-decoding-of-reed-solomon-codes/

http://www.schifra.com/faq.html

http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~guyb/realworld/reedsolomon/reed_solomon_codes.html

Comments.Message:
I would suggest to reuse code without importing the whole external library.
Thus we are targeting also small scaled systems like Windows Mobile.
Please keep in mind to check the license of used code and keep appropriate copyright notes in code respectively.

Yep. I was thinking of same thing. I will look into code from ZXing later.
Also take look at discussion page if you have time. See if encode process list is correctly listed.

http://www.pclviewer.com/rs2/calculator.html
Detailed calculation for QR code error correction. 
List here for reference.
